text:
Mr. L. J. A. van Dijk
February 25,
1958
-2-
Fin&Lly you might contact Dr. Louis Lewis, Educational Administrator,
Engineering Products Dept., Radio Corporation of America, Building 15-6,
Camden 2, New Jersey. His office of RCA has recently distributed a
rather large collection of material on this subject.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
HJSsjw
CCS Dr. Sara Becker
